DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text code to represent the order of feeding regimen assigned to a patient. [Manually-curated]

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care._Delivery method where a compound/drug is administered in food or water._Describes an experiment or clinical trial in which animal or human subjects are assigned by chance to separate groups that compare different treatments._Assignment; an undertaking that you have been assigned to do.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.:Delivery method where a compound/drug is administered in food or water.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
Delivery method where a compound/drug is administered in food or water.

Property.preferredDefinition: Describes an experiment or clinical trial in which animal or human subjects are assigned by chance to separate groups that compare different treatments.:Assignment; an undertaking that you have been assigned to do.

Concepts.definition: Describes an experiment or clinical trial in which animal or human subjects are assigned by chance to separate groups that compare different treatments.
An allotting or an appointment to a particular person or use, or for a particular time or object.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Delivery method where a compound/drug is administered in food or water._The allocation of individuals to groups by chance, especially in order to control the variables in an experiment._Assignment; an undertaking that you have been assigned to do._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Delivery method where a compound/drug is administered in food or water.:The allocation of individuals to groups by chance, especially in order to control the variables in an experiment.:Assignment; an undertaking that you have been assigned to do.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support Arizona Cancer Center adoption of C3D.
